subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Dodgers outfielder Matt Kemp stumbled to a .249 average in 2010 after he and the pop star Rihanna broke up, but now he is among the leading National League batters in most categories.
snippet: The Dodgers outfielder Matt Kemp stumbled to a .249 average in 2010 after he and the pop star Rihanna broke up, but now he is among the leading National League batters in most categories.
